history.content:
Dear CS Majors,
This is a reminder that the deadline to apply for a Summer Session GSI is next Wednesday at midnight. Please submit an application by then if you are interested in being a Summer Session GSI. The original announcement is attached below.
Thanks.
Pat
---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Catherine Bouvier Dang <catherinedang@berkeley.edu>
Date: Thu, Feb 19, 2015 at 2:56 PM
Subject: [eecs-gsi-list] Summer 2015 GSI Applications Now Open!
To: eecs-gsi-list <eecs-gsi-list@eecs.berkeley.edu>, eecs-grads@eecs.berkeley.edu


Summer 2015 GSI Applications are now open! 

 

Please note: Deadline for EE and CS courses is  April 1, 2015

 

Online applications are located at:

https://willow.coe.berkeley.edu/PHP/gsiapp/menu.php

 

GSI positions are available for EE 40 and CS 10, 61A, 61BL, 61C, 70, 160, 162, 188, and 375.

 

If you are interested in becoming a GSI for the Summer 2015 semester, you must meet the Graduate Division requirements.

 

If you are an international student and summer 2015 will be your first time being a GSI, you must complete the Language Proficiency Screening Questionnaire by March 1, 2015.

 

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.

 

 

Best,

 

Catherine

--
Catherine Bouvier Dang
CS Graduate Admissions CoordinatorLower Division CS GSI Hiring CoordinatorUniversity of California, Berkeley
Electrical Engineering & Computer Sciences205 Cory Hall M-F: 9AM-12PM & 1-4PM
Ph: 510-642-6285 Fax: 510-642-8805
history.subject: Reminder- deadline to apply to be a Summer uGSI is approaching!
